name: Suspicious Net Use Command Combo
description: Detects net use command combo which executes files from WebDAV server; seen in malicious LNK files
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Nn][Ee][Tt]\ [Uu][Ss][Ee]\ [Hh][Tt][Tt][Pp].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\&\ [Ss][Tt][Aa][Rr][Tt]\ \/[Bb]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\[Dd][Aa][Vv][Ww][Ww][Ww][Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt]\\.*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]\ .*/ OR /.*\.[Bb][Aa][Tt]\ .*/ OR /.*\.[Vv][Bb][Ss]\ .*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Ss]1\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\cmd.exe* AND process.command_line:*\ net\ use\ http* AND process.command_line:*&\ start\ \/b\ * AND process.command_line:*\\DavWWWRoot\\* AND process.command_line:(*.exe\ * OR *.dll\ * OR *.bat\ * OR *.vbs\ * OR *.ps1\ *))`
